Description.value: Updates Craftworx overhaul mod to A17.4 Stable. Includes modified Sirillion's SMX UI and Big Bag Mod, Khaine's Harvestable Plants and Lockpicking, Guppycur's Placeable Light Mod, JaxTeller718's Junk Items, Elucidus' Impact Wrench and Quality Level Reduced Stamina Loss and Effectiveness Bonus
